name: Trolls Get Blocked
description:
Welcome to "Trolls Get Blocked" the video game adaptation of the cinematic masterpiece that is the 19 dolla fortnite card film series, fight your way to the 19 dolla fortnite card.

if you have never watched the FCU then here is the entire saga for free on youtube:

Note: this game is not to be taken seriously and was made in under 2 hours.
